briefTitle: Evaluation of a New Cardiac Biomarker Assay
officialTitle: Design Validation Protocol for the Evaluation of ARCHITECT STAT High Sensitive Troponin I Assay

interventions.name: ARCHITECT STAT High Sensitive Troponin I Assay

arms.label: ARCHITECT STAT High Sensitive Troponin I Assay testing

summary: The objective of the study is to evaluate the performance and intended use of a new cardiac biomarker test, Troponin I, in an intended use population. Blood specimens will be tested using the new investigational test that detects the level of Troponin I. Results will be compared to the diagnosis of whether or not an acute myocardial infarction (MI) occurred.

primaryOutcome.measure: Clinical Performance - Area Under the Curve
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Troponin value from three collection time points (0-2 hours, >2 and up to 4 hours, >4 hours and up to 9 hours) from subject presentation to the emergency department

effectByArm.arm: Area Under the Curve in K2 EDTA
Area Under the Curve in Lithium Heparin Separator
Area Under the Curve in Serum Separator
